What's New in Journal for macOS 1.3.1

Bug Fixes and Improvements

  • Fixed rich text editor issues with formatting preservation
  • Resolved text color inconsistencies when creating and editing entries
  • Fixed cursor and placeholder text behavior
  • Eliminated console warnings and error messages

New Features

  • Enhanced text formatting options with improved sidebar
  • Added support for font selection and rich text attributes
  • Improved RTFD handling to maintain all formatting attributes

Optimizations

  • Reduced memory usage and prevented memory leaks
  • Improved performance with debounced text updates
  • Fixed multiple SwiftUI state update warnings
  • Eliminated unnecessary debug logging

UI Improvements

  • Enhanced sidebar animations with spring physics
  • Improved emotion selection overlay handling
  • Fixed text input cursor behavior and placeholder text
  • Better visual feedback during formatting changes

This update significantly improves the stability and reliability of the journal's core text editing capabilities while adding enhanced formatting options.
